cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on the Judiciary on June 15, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 282, Territorial Judgeship Retirement Equity Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 7 (Tuesday, January 12, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SAN NICOLAS:
H.R. 282.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 2 of Section 3 of Article IV of the Constitution.
Clause 18 of Section 8 of Article I of the Constitution.
[Page H149]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

sponsors.fullName: Del. San Nicolas, Michael F. Q. [D-GU-At Large]
